title: ID simple serif?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419005501im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JSI_map_3907.gif)

My low-tech client's husband uploaded this image, which leads me to believe the font was probably preloaded on his computer. Any thoughts?
author: smrvl

comments.content: Probably Footlight. Note the tight spacing and [angled stress in the 'o' and zero](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419005501/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/footlight_regular/?sample_text=Leucadia%20Saxony%20101).
